20110120144243.000|20110120144245.000|TR0|was 2001.  And China had officially been 
20110120144245.000|20110120144247.000|TR0|opened at that point, for more than 20 
20110120144247.000|20110120144250.000|TR0|years.  But Westerners were still kind of

20110120144306.000|20110120144308.000|TR0|connect.  Many people are never seen a 
20110120144308.000|20110120144310.000|TR0|non- Chinese person in their lives.
20110120144310.000|20110120144312.000|TR0|
20110120144312.000|20110120144315.000|TR0|PHILLIPS:  So, that's interesting.  You
